welcome_message_body: Welcome to Serravalle, the charming and picturesque city known for its rich history and breathtaking views. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of this unique destination. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building for Miramare Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luigi Ridolfi Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Luigi Ridolfi Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
